name: snsConsumer-lambda-js
description: AWS Lambda function to process inbound SNS and write out the payload to a specified S3 bucket

scripts.bundle: zip -r dist/bundle.zip node_modules && zip -j dist/bundle.zip src/lambda.js
scripts.build: npm install && npm run setup && npm run bundle && npm run deploy
